price: Yεde onipa biara dwumadie (anaa nehyԑberԑ) asεn nekͻn mu, na Yεbeyi no adi akyerε no wͻ Wusͻreε da no, na ͻbehunu no (tesε) nwoma a yabue mu.
arabic: وَكُلَّ إِنسَٰنٍ أَلۡزَمۡنَٰهُ طَٰٓئِرَهُۥ فِي عُنُقِهِۦۖ وَنُخۡرِجُ لَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ كِتَٰبٗا يَلۡقَىٰهُ مَنشُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakulla insānin alzamnāhu ṭāirahu fī ʿunuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma al-qiyāmati kitāban yalqāhu manshūran
